rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Large entrance with wheelchair ramps and automatic doors for easy access. Incorporates Vastu principles by placing it in the south-east corner to invite positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living area adjacent to the central courtyard; designed with ample natural light and wheelchair accessible pathways. Vastu-friendly placement in the south-west direction to ensure balance.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, ensuring family interaction; includes a circular layout for energy flow and central accessibility.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with ergonomic design for wheelchair use; placed in the north-west corner in accordance with Vastu for positive circulation of air and light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with en-suite bathroom; designed to be wheelchair accessible with lowered fixtures and door thresholds; located in the north-east corner following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room featuring ample natural light; wheelchair accessible design; placed opposite to master bedroom for balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Children's Bedroom
rooms.description: Safe and secure space for children with low-level windows; designed with Vastu principles placing it in the south-east zone for nurturing positivity.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office with ergonomic furniture and ample natural light; located near the living room area to maintain connectivity but away from distractions; wheelchair accessible design.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Well-equipped gym with space for various equipment; designed with wide doorways and smooth floor finishes for wheelchair accessibility; strategically placed near the courtyard to maintain fresh air flow and Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A central open space that fosters natural ventilation, light, and communal interaction; surrounded by rooms ensuring privacy yet connectivity according to Vastu principles.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large automatic door with ramp access for wheelchair users.

openings.name: Balcony Doorway
openings.description: Accessible balcony overlooking the courtyard; designed to allow easy mobility.
